Module com.example.eventscheduler
Package com.eventscheduler.model

Class EventManager

java.lang.Object
com.eventscheduler.model.dao.EventManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBManager<EventModel>
public class EventManager extends Object implements DBManager<EventModel>
The EventManager class is responsible for managing events in the MongoDB database. It implements the DBManager interface and provides methods to add, remove, update, and retrieve events from the database. It also provides methods to retrieve events based on specific criteria such as month, day, and nearest events.
